extendedInfo.description: KHOU 11 Houston Sports is your go-to source for coverage of the Houston Texans and more. You'll also find coverage of the Houston Rockets, Houston Astros and Houston Dynamo so you can follow your favorite teams all year long. The KHOU 11 Houston Sports free application provides the latest news, scores, polls, standings, roster, schedules, video and photos for college and professional teams throughout Texas and beyond. It also contains news and standings for college teams so you can follow your favorites from the palm of your hand. âKHOU 11 Sports Coverage - Includes the latest highlights for your favorite Texas teams. - Watch âSports Extraâ with anchor Bob Allen airing Sundays at 10:25 p.m. for Athlete of the Week and sports analysis. Other app highlights include: â Stats & Scores - Football (NFL, NCAA) - Baseball (MLB) - Basketball (NBA, NCAA) - Soccer - Golf (PGA) - Auto Racing â Standings - includes rankings for college teams â Schedules - seasonal team schedules â College Polls - AP, coaches, BCS â GPS Forecast - from where you're standing â Notifications - 'On' for breaking sports news â Upload fan photos Download the free app now and share with all your friends. Count on the KHOU 11 Sports team to keep you plugged in all season!

reviews.title: Stay Away!! Misleading and NOT for Texans
reviews.comment: If you\'re going to say TEXAS in your title, you should include ALL of it like Central Texas, East Texas, the Valley, West Texas, etc.  Houston and Dallas do NOT constitute all of Texas.  And what\'s the point of options that simply take you to a mobile website?  (i.e. college standings). I can do that on my browser.  And why would I EVER need Houston news scrolling across the screen when 1) I don\'t live there and 2) WHAT DOES THAT HAVE TO DO WITH FOOTBALL!!!.  And Bios of Houston news staff (again, people that have nothing to do with football)    Overall the app is very slow and many of the web pages came up not available (again, why am I directed to a web page?)  Perhaps it\'s the ads that run in the background or maybe the poor coding.  Maybe it\'s because KHOU got a developer from Minnesota who doesn\'t know anything about Texas or football.  Even if I still lived in Houstin, I wouldn\'t use this app.    It\'s sad the developer had to get their friends to rate it 5 stars and artificially inflate its rating.  There are much better ones out there.  I would have given it 0 stars but it has a nice picture of the hot weather chick Chita Johnson.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Great app, lots of good info.

reviews.title: Sucks
reviews.comment: Yall couldnt care less about anyone outside if the 3 cities you apparently think are the only ones in texas... much less smaller schools.  I would bet my life there are many small town athletes that would make many of your bigger city kids be envious.  I installed this app... and uninstalled it immediately.
reviews.author: A Google User
